title: Rift Rivals Victors Icon?
body:
When are we receiving the Rift Rivals Victors icon that we got promised?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/rift-rivals-hits-rift

replies.body: They should all be in the process of being delivered over the next two weeks. If you still haven't gotten yours by 7/25 reach out to us in a ticket!
